| HistoryText             = The '''Sebettu''' (or '''Isirru''' in [[Babylon]]) were a group of seven gods{{r|All-New Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z: Update #3|; [[Annunaki (Deities)|Annunaki]]'s entry, [[Nergal (Earth-616)|Nergal]]'s paragraph}} or divine warriors, including [[Imdugud (Earth-616)|Pazuzu]] and seemingly [[Nergal (Earth-616)|Nergal]].{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Imdugud (Earth-616)|Pazuzu]]' entry}} 

Two goals of the Sebettu have been identified so far:
* They guarded their territories against malevolent entities.{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Imdugud (Earth-616)|Pazuzu]]' entry}}
* They often followed [[Nergal (Earth-616)|Nergal]] into battle, spreading famine, drought and pestilence among their enemies to prevent survivors.{{r|All-New Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z: Update #3|; [[Annunaki (Deities)|Annunaki]]'s entry, [[Nergal (Earth-616)|Nergal]]'s paragraph}}

| Notes                   = [[Nergal (Earth-616)|Nergal]]'s status towards the Sebettu is unclear: One account presents them as followed by the Sebettu,{{r|All-New Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z: Update #3|; [[Annunaki (Deities)|Annunaki]]'s entry, [[Nergal (Earth-616)|Nergal]]'s paragraph}} while another presents him as part of the group.{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Imdugud (Earth-616)|Pazuzu]]' entry}}
